articles.title: The Best of Bizarrap, Argentina’s Hottest Producer
articles.description: The beatmaker’s BZRP Music Sessions YouTube series has become a viral phenomenon. Here are five of the liveliest episodes.
articles.content: In the last few years, Argentine producer Gonzalo Conde, better known as Bizarrap (pronounced “Bee-shah-rahp”), has bum-rushed the global stage, becoming one of the world’s most thrilling beatmakers. The 23-year-old’s style smashes together EDM’s bra... [5861 chars]

articles.title: New wonderkid on Liverpool radar as agent reveals he is 'waiting for a call' from Jurgen Klopp's side
articles.description: Fulham attacking midfielder Fabio Carvalho is not the only starlet on the radar of Liverpool as they are reportedly targeting Argentina's Facundo Farias.
articles.content:
Fulham starlet Fabio Carvalho is not the only teenager Liverpool want to sign as are they reportedly targeting an Argentine wonderkid.
Attacking midfielder Carvalho had been in line for an Anfield transfer during January. The Reds had an initial £5mi... [3113 chars]

articles.title: Argentina Open: 2020 Champion Casper Ruud Wins First Match on Return From Injury
articles.description: The unseeded Spaniard will next face third seed Lorenzo Sonego, who was a 6-3, 6-3 winner over Argentina's Sebastian Baez in Wednesday's nightcap.
articles.content: Casper Ruud made a successful return to action at Argentina Open following an ankle injury that forced his late withdrawal from the Australian Open. Playing his first match since the ATP Cup, the 23-year-old Norwegian defeated Roberto Carballes Baena... [2300 chars]

articles.description: Ruud, the 8th-best ranked tennis player in the circuit, will face local favourite Federico Coria, who earlier beat fifth-seeded Dusan Lajovic of Serbia 4-6, 7-5, 6-4.

articles.title: Man City to follow Julian Alvarez deal with two more Argentina starlets as initial transfer talks held
articles.description: Man City could follow the transfer of young striker Julian Alvarez by signing two more starlets from Argentina, according to reports.
articles.content:
Julian Alvarez might not be the only young Argentine starlet to join Man City this year as they are reportedly scouting two Boca Juniors players.
Alvarez is a 22-year-old forward who was in deadly form during the most recent Liga Profesional campaign... [3014 chars]

articles.title: Top-seeded Ruud advances to Argentina Open quarterfinals
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Top-seeded Casper Ruud of Norway defeated Spain’s Roberto Carballés Baena 7-6 (2), 6-2 on Wednesday to advance to the quarterfinal...
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES (AP) — Top-seeded Casper Ruud of Norway defeated Spain’s Roberto Carballés Baena 7-6 (2), 6-2 on Wednesday to advance to the quarterfinals of the Argentina Open.

articles.title: ‘Don’t Like People Yelling Shut Up to Me’: Holger Rune Vents Out His Frustration on Fans in Buenos Aires
articles.description: Next Gen ATP star Holger Rune took to his Instagram, posting a story about his tiff with fans in his first round defeat in Argentina Open.
articles.content:
Published 02/09/2022, 2:12 AM EST
Wildcard Holger Rune crashed out in the first round of the ATP 250 Argentina Open. He was beaten by the Argentinian Sebastian Baez. However, for Rune, it was not the match that took the limelight; it was the behavior... [2460 chars]
